docInfo.title: <document title in english>
docInfo.acronym: <acronym of the organization/institution/owner of the document>

shortDescription.text: <description of the document - if not found generate one (up to 100 words) using the most informative paragraphs of the document>
shortDescription.generated: <boolean field: true if generated (or synthesized by data of the document), false if found exactly as is in the document>

abstract.text: <document abstract - if not found generate one using the most informative paragraphs of the document
abstract.generated: <boolean field: true if generated (or synthesized by data of the document), false if found exactly as is in the document>

summary.text: <document summary - if not found generate one using the most informative paragraphs of the document
summary.generated: <boolean field: true if text was generated, false if text was found in the document>

docInfo.startDate: <policy start date in year format - if document refers to a policy>
docInfo.endDate: <policy end date in year format - if document refers to a policy>
docInfo.language: <ISO 639 language of the most prevalent text - use language detection to set this value>

authors.name: <author full name>
authors.orcid: <ORCID of the author - if an ORCID exists (ORCID format: https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX)>

links.name: <linked document/dataset/resource name>
links.pid: <persistent identifier of linked document - if a persistent identifier can be found>
links.type: <link type: e.g. 'doi'/'handle'/'ark'/'purl'/'urn'/'swhid'(when pid found), 'link', 'repository', 'terms' - if link is pointing to a dataset, fill this with the type of the provided data>

tags: <tags of document: values among ['national policy', 'university policy', 'use cases', 'strategy', 'RPO policy', 'RFO policy', 'survey', 'survey results'] | (RPO=Research Performing Organization policy, RFO=Research Funding Organization)>
otherTags: <list of 3-7 relevant tags based on document content>
